text: José María Álvarez del Manzano y López del Hierro (born 17 October 1937) is a Spanish politician. He is a member of the People's Party. He became the Mayor of Madrid in 1991, a position that he held until 2003. He chaired the board of IFEMA (Institute for Exhibitions and Fairs Madrid) for 24 years, until 2015. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:People from Seville Category:Mayors of Madrid
title: José María Álvarez del Manzano
